sen.j: 高田文二郎（たかだ ぶんじろう、天保9年（1838年） - 慶応4年9月5日 (旧暦)（1868年10月20日））は、武蔵国江戸出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Bunjiro TAKADA (1838 - October 20, 1868),from Edo, Musashi Province, was a member of Shinsengumi.
Bunjiro TAKADA (1838 - October 20, 1868), from Edo, Musashi Province, was a member of the Shinsengumi.
sen.cmt: ), スペースを削除し、カンマの後ろにスペースを追加しました。ピリオド前のスペースを削除しました。the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。
sen.e: Bunjiro TAKADA (1838 - October 20, 1868), from Edo, Musashi Province, was a member of the Shinsengumi.
He served as 機械方下役.
sen.cmt: 読み方および意味不明
sen.e: He served as Kikaikata Shitayaku (lower class noble in charge of machinery).
sen.cmt: Kikaikata Shitayaku (lower class noble in charge of machinery) としました。機械方下役：定訳不明です。
sen.e: He served as Kikaikata Shitayaku (lower class noble in charge of machinery).

sen.j: 戊辰戦争が勃発した後に新選組に入隊。
sen.e: After the outbreak of Boshin War, he joined Shisengumi.
After the outbreak of Boshin War, he joined the Shisengumi.
sen.cmt: the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。
sen.e: After the outbreak of Boshin War, he joined the Shisengumi.

sen.j: 白河口の戦いや母成峠の戦い（会津戦争）に参戦し、越後口高久村に会津藩の援軍として派遣された。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi or the Battle of Bonari-toge (Aizu war), and was dispatched to Echigo-guchi Takaku-mura as a reinforcement of the Aizu clan.
He participated in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi and the Battle of Bonari-toge (Aizu war), and was dispatched to Echigo-guchi Takaku-mura as a reinforcement of the Aizu clan.
sen.cmt: or ⇒ and に訂正しました。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi and the Battle of Bonari-toge (Aizu war), and was dispatched to Echigo-guchi Takaku-mura as a reinforcement of the Aizu clan.

sen.j: 新政府軍の如来堂襲撃により戦死と伝わる。
sen.e: It is known that he was killed in Nyoraido attack by the New government army.
It is said that he was killed in Nyoraido attack by the New government army.
sen.cmt: known ⇒ said に訂正しました。
sen.e: It is said that he was killed in Nyoraido attack by the New government army.
He died at the age of 31.
He died at the age of 31.
He died at the age of 31.
